data.title: Ants & Mustard: Unique African Gifts, Curios, Souvenirs and Speciality Foods
data.meta_description: Original oil painting on Masonite board, measures 30 cm by 30 cm
data.meta_site_name: Ants & Mustard: Unique African Gifts, Curios, Souvenirs and Speciality Foods
data.text:
Description

Turtle. Original oil painting on Masonite board by artist Justin Mashora, measures 30 cm by 30 cm. Justin Mashora is a Zimbabwe born artist residing in Durban, South Africa. He specializes in wildlife paintings in acrylics and oil, experimenting with different techniques. Before coming to South Africa, he was already exhibiting his works in different art galleries in Zimbabwe, including the now defunct National Art Gallery of Zimbabwe.
